summary: This mod removes the sound when you make a stealth attack.
descriptionHtml:
[center][b]
[/b]I think the stealth attacks must be silent. So, they are now.

[b]What this mod does?[/b]
Simply, replacing empty sound file to the stealth attack sound.

[/center][b][u]note:[/u][/b] There is a mod which is doing exacly the same thing but that mod has esp file. Mine has not. Skyrim has 254 esp file limit, this version for users who has lots of esp files.

[center][b]How to Install?[/b]

Use your mod manager or take the files to the data folder.[/center]

ENJOY!
author: ismetisgor
